name: FriendHelper+
description:
Friend Helper + is a friend helper simulation game for the new millenia. <3<3<3 #screensaverjam

Press 'n' for night time.

Press 'd' for day time.

Art, programming, and writing by Eric Mack.

Music, sound, and writing by Marcus Seletzki.

Web port by Alex Sussman.

Note : Firefox is unsupported at this time

Title Sequence Voice Acting by Kristen Brogan
